# Analyze Project Technology Stack

Analyze the entire project and provide a comprehensive overview of the complete technology stack, including: 

## Languages
- Programming languages used
- Markup and styling languages

## Frontend
- Frameworks and libraries
- UI component libraries
- State management tools

## Backend
- Frameworks and libraries
- API technologies (REST, GraphQL, etc.)
- Server technologies

## Database
- Database systems (SQL, NoSQL)
- ORMs or database clients
- Caching systems

## Build & Development Tools
- Package managers
- Build tools and bundlers
- Development servers
- Linters and formatters

## Testing
- Testing frameworks
- Test runners
- E2E testing tools
- Code coverage tools

## DevOps & Infrastructure
- CI/CD tools and pipelines
- Containerization (Docker, Kubernetes, etc.)
- Cloud services or hosting platforms
- Monitoring and logging tools

## Security & Authentication
- Authentication mechanisms
- Authorization tools
- Security libraries

## Other Technologies
- Version control
- Documentation tools
- Any other relevant technologies

## Project Information
- Main purpose of the project
- Architecture pattern used (MVC, microservices, monolithic, etc.)
- Project structure overview
